original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācarati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā channaḥ anācāram ācarati

original: “kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṁ vattabbaṁ maññatha?
analyzed: kim nu kho nāma tumhe āvuso mam vattabbam maññatha

original: Seyyathāpi nāma mahāvāto vāyanto tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇasaṭaṁ ekato ussāreyya, seyyathā vā pana nadī pabbateyyā saṅkhasevālapaṇakaṁ ekato ussāreyya;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma mahā vātaḥ vāyantaḥ tiṇa kaṭṭha paṇṇa saṭam ekatas ussāreyya seyyathā vā pana nadī pabbateyyā saṅkha sevā lapaṇakam ekatas ussāreyya

original: evameva tumhe nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā ekato ussāritā.
analyzed: evam eva tumhe nānā nāmāḥ nānā gottāḥ nānā jaccāḥ nānā kulāḥ pabbajitāḥ ekatas ussāritāḥ

original: Kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṁ vattabbaṁ maññatha?
analyzed: kim nu kho nāma tumhe āvuso mam vattabbam maññatha
amhākam ayya puttena dhammo abhisamito ti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karissatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā channaḥ bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam avacanīyam karissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam channam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karosī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva channa bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam a vacanīyam karosi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva moghapurisa bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam a vacanīyam karissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti—
analyzed: bhikkhu pana iva dubbaca jātikaḥ hoti uddesa pariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam avacanīyam karoti

original: ‘mā maṁ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā,
analyzed: mā mama āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā aham pa āyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā
so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘māyasmā attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ akāsi, vacanīyamevāyasmā attānaṁ karotu,
analyzed: mā ayasmai attānam a vacanīyam akāsi vacanīyam eva ayasmai attānam karotu

original: āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṁ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
analyzed: āyasmā api bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena bhikkhū upi āyasmantam vakkhanti sahadhammena

original: Evaṁ saṁvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṁ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā’ti.
analyzed: evam savaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yat idam aññamañña vacanena aññamañña vuṭṭhāpanena ati

original: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: evam ca saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ tathā iva paggaṇheyya saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyam samanubhāsitabbaḥ tassa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;

analyzed: no ce paṭinissajjeyya saṅgha ādisesaḥ ti
bhikkhū pana iva dubbaca jātiko hoti iti

original: dubbaco hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṁ.
analyzed: dubbacaḥ hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ akkhamaḥ appadakkhiṇa ggāhī anusāsani

original: yaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ, etaṁ sahadhammikaṁ nāma.
analyzed: yam bhagavatā paññattam sikkhāpade etam sahadhammikam nāma
tena vuccamānaḥ attānam a vacanīyam karoti

original: “mā maṁ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā. Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti.
analyzed: mā mama āyasmantaḥ kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā aham pa āyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā viramatha āyasmantaḥ mama vacanāya ati

original: aññehi bhikkhūhi. Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbo—
analyzed: aññehi bhikkhūhi ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbaḥ

original: Āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṁ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
analyzed: āyasmā api bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena bhikkhū upi āyasmantam vakkhanti sahadhammena

original: Evaṁ saṁvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṁ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti.
analyzed: evam savaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yat idam aññamañña vacanena aññamañña vuṭṭhāpanena ati
so bhikkhu saṅgha majjham pi ākaḍḍhitvā vattabbaḥ
mā ayasmai attānam avacanīyam akāsi pe

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam avacanīyam karoti

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhum samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam avacanīyam karoti

original: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhum samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya saḥ tuṇhassa
dutiyam pi etam attham vadāmi pe

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam avacanīyam karoti

original: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhum samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya saḥ tuṇhassa

original: Samanubhaṭṭho saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: samanubhaṭṭhaḥ saṅghena itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya
kamma vācā pariyosāne āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa

original: Saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
analyzed: saṅgha ādisesam ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭa dvīhi kamma vācāhi thullaccayā
pe tena api vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti

original: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññī na paṭinissajjati āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa

original: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme vematikaḥ na paṭinissajjati āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa

original: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññī na paṭinissajjati āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
adhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
